body.p: WHITCOMB The Birthday Club met at the home of Mrs. Wm. Schoening Friday afternoon. Mr. and Mrs Frank Strebe and son. Donald of Sherulan were Sunday visitors at the Leo Jouhert home. Mr, and Mrs Usonard Hoffman and son Robert of Germania were Sunday visitors at the John Liesrh home. Mrs. Elmer Groonwald. Mrs. Wm. Schoening. Mrs- Paul Buhiitz. Mrs Chris. Fading. Mrs. Clarence Stai Mrs. Renzel Joubert and Mrs. Allan McAuly were guests at the St. John's ladies' Aid at Wittenberg Thursday afternoon. Mr. and Mrs. Elmer Groonwald entertained Friends with a card party Thursday evening. A delicious lunch was served after the games. All reported a nice time. Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Gehrke and children, Lois and Russell, of Reds Granite were callers in this community Friday. Beatrice Joubert accompanied friends to Rib Mt. Sunday afternoon where they watched the skiers. Mr, and Mrs. Arvil Low and son Leland of Tigerton were visitors at the Harriet Becker home Monday.
